data.lyric:
[ti:A$AP Forever]
[ar:A$AP Rocky/Moby/T.I./Kid Cudi]
[al:TESTING (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]A$AP Forever REMIX (Explicit) - A$AP Rocky/Moby/T.I./Kid Cudi
[00:00.02]Lyricist：Rakim Mayers/Mario Loving/Nesbitt Wesonga/Hector Delgado
[00:00.03]Composer：Rakim Mayers/Mario Loving/Nesbitt Wesonga/Hector Delgado
[00:00.13]Gang
[00:00.56]
[00:04.85]Gang
[00:05.42]
[00:06.19]They tryna front on the gang
[00:07.98]
[00:12.27]Aye if anybody ever took the time to ask Rocky
[00:15.18]What A$AP meant to him
[00:16.44]
[00:17.22]And if so he would tell you always striving and prospering
[00:20.72]
[00:22.71]A$AP partna free my n**ga cap
[00:27.64]
[00:29.27]R.I.P Big Phil R.I.P A$AP Yams
[00:33.49]
[00:34.96]Ya dig gang
[00:37.18]Come f**k with the Mob shout out to the Lords and the Gods
[00:39.45]In love with my b**ch 'cause she bi
[00:40.98]My ice like the stars I tell that b**ch cover your eyes
[00:43.45]Cause f**kin' with me you go blind
[00:44.75]She losin' her mind we kiss to Frank Ocean and Blonde
[00:47.14]Convincin' my b**ch to go blonde
[00:48.59]Was born in the dark I kill you you open my blinds
[00:50.84]On Yams and that's word to my moms
[00:52.54]Margiela Madman with cases I'm still tryna beat
[00:54.69]A bunch of sh*t from a long time ago
[00:56.58]The bigger they are the harder they fall
[00:58.56]Like dominos n**ga geronimos
[01:00.11]When it's my time to go adios vamonos
[01:02.00]Flacko no dominicano but eat the tostones with platanos
[01:04.83]Dealing with life and its highs and lows
[01:06.54]I'm just pimpin' like I'm supposed
[01:07.97]I guess it's called livin' sh*t I suppose
[01:10.03]I'm on my live alone die vlone
[01:11.91]Ain't talkin' 'bout spending or buyin' clothes
[01:13.95]I'm 'bout my business but I'm alone
[01:15.71]I still had the vision when I was broke
[01:17.70]F**kin' on b**ches and foreign h**s
[01:19.68]Flyin' out women to boring shows
[01:21.51]I pray to God I don't overdose
[01:23.43]I put A$AP on my tat woo
[01:25.41]I put New York on the map woo
[01:27.22]I put the gang on the flames woo
[01:29.24]They gon' remember the name
[01:30.44]
[01:30.97]They robbin' boys for the chains woo
[01:32.91]I got Goyard by the sack woo
[01:34.80]I got the boof by the pack woo
[01:36.78]I f**ked your boo on her back
[01:38.21]
[01:38.76]Gang gang them boys not flexing the same
[01:42.35]I'm done with adjusting to fame pull up on your set leave a stain
[01:45.77]
[01:46.40]Gang gang I tell her come f**k with the gang
[01:49.92]I tell 'em don't f**k with the gang it's time to f**k up the whole game
[01:53.37]
[02:08.18]I'm free as a bird I wanted this sh*t my whole life
[02:10.91]But had all this stress on my mind
[02:12.37]Until I realized things plan out when it's right
[02:14.89]In the meantime I'ma grind
[02:16.12]I think of the days when I was so young on my plight
[02:18.67]Party and bullsh*t and play
[02:20.03]Was up in the city the one surrounded by lights
[02:22.49]Wanted to burn it away
[02:23.74]Get out of his lane got no time don't need no advice
[02:26.29]Except for my momma
[02:27.32]Ride for my daughter she all I need
[02:29.23]She got her father as I go
[02:31.12]Hell yeah I did it I'm on a roll
[02:32.97]Thought I'd be up with my n**ga no
[02:34.81]I'm just gettin' warmed up let's start the show
[02:36.63]I'm schoolin' these n**gas so in the zone and I'm rigged to blow
[02:39.64]A$AP and Cud life forever though
[02:41.24]And I'm flossin' and bossin' these silly h**s
[02:43.44]Learned the codes
[02:44.44]Serve up the magic for all of those
[02:46.36]Kids that ain't had someone on they own
[02:48.19]Hang on the words you each have your song
[02:50.06]Grab on and hold on won't steer you wrong
[02:52.04]Sing a long sing a long hmm
[02:54.77]I put A$AP on my tat woo
[02:56.76]I put New York on the map woo
[02:58.65]I put the gang on the flames woo
[03:00.53]They gon' remember the name
[03:02.41]They robbin' boys for the chains woo
[03:04.30]I got Goyard by the sack woo
[03:06.20]I got the boof by the pack woo
[03:08.16]I f**ked your boo on her back
[03:09.53]
[03:10.17]Gang gang them boys not flexing the same
[03:13.77]I'm done with adjusting to fame pull up on your set leave a stain
[03:17.15]
[03:17.79]Gang gang I tell her come f**k with the gang
[03:21.38]I tell 'em don't f**k with the gang it's time to f**k up the whole game
[03:24.97]Game game game game
[03:26.64]
[03:27.56]Gang gang
[03:29.78]
[03:30.59]They tryna front on the gang they gon' remember my name
[03:34.95]
[04:09.44]True to truth somehow
[04:12.35]
[04:13.06]But never truly lied at all then and now
[04:18.06]
[04:19.78]True to truth somehow
[04:22.48]
[04:23.21]But never truly lied at all then and now
[04:28.16]
[04:29.91]True to truth somehow
[04:33.29]But never truly lied at all then and now
[04:37.96]
[04:39.83]True to truth somehow
[04:43.38]But never truly lied at all then and now
[04:48.51]
[04:50.12]True to truth somehow
[04:53.70]Never truly lied at all
[04:56.63]
[04:58.55]But never truly lied at all
[05:01.95]
[05:03.40]But never truly lied at all
[05:06.75]Then and now
[05:08.00]
[05:09.33]Then and now
[05:11.03]I never meant to lie
data.trans:
[ti:A$AP Forever]
[ar:A$AP Rocky/Moby/T.I./Kid Cudi]
[al:TESTING (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]//
[00:00.02]//
[00:00.03]//
[00:00.13]那群人
[00:00.56]
[00:04.85]那群人
[00:05.42]
[00:06.19]他们想在我前面 
[00:07.98]
[00:12.27]如果谁有空问问Rocky
[00:15.18]A$AP对他的意义是什么
[00:16.44]
[00:17.22]他会告诉你那永远代表着奋斗和光明
[00:20.72]
[00:22.71]A$AP的伙伴 放了我兄弟
[00:27.64]
[00:29.27]Big Phil 和 A$AP Yams，愿你们安息
[00:33.49]
[00:34.96]你知道的
[00:37.18]和Mob鬼混 向众神大喊
[00:39.45]我爱上了我的姐妹 她是双
[00:40.98]我的钻石像星星一般耀眼 我对她说 把眼睛遮住
[00:43.45]因为与我翻云覆雨 你会爽的眼前发黑
[00:44.75]我们在Frank Ocean and Blonde前亲吻时 她就失了心神
[00:47.14]想劝我的女人也去染成金发
[00:48.59]我们生在黑暗之中 唯有将你杀死才能重见光明
[00:50.84]向Yams问好 这是对我妈妈说的
[00:52.54]Margiela女士 手上各种案子 我依然试着表演
[00:54.69]很久之前的破事了
[00:56.58]他们越大 就摔得越惨
[00:58.56]就像多米诺骨牌
[01:00.11]我该走了 再见 我们走了
[01:02.00]我不是多米尼加人，但也吃tostones with platanos
[01:04.83]处理生活当中的跌宕起伏
[01:06.54]就像我该做的那样
[01:07.97]我想这就是生活吧
[01:10.03]我独自生活 死于vlone
[01:11.91]不再谈论花钱买衣服
[01:13.95]全身心投入工作 但我就一个人
[01:15.71]我破产时 还是有远见的
[01:17.70]和各种辣妹鬼混
[01:19.68]和美女去看无聊的演出
[01:21.51]我想上帝祈祷没有过度用药
[01:23.43]我把A$AP纹在身上
[01:25.41]我把纽约纳入蓝图
[01:27.22]我用帮派武装
[01:29.24]他们会记住我的大名
[01:30.44]
[01:30.97]他们为了金链子抢劫男孩
[01:32.91]我得到了很多Goyard
[01:34.80]我的钱都是以袋计算的
[01:36.78]我从后面进入你的女人
[01:38.21]
[01:38.76]这些男孩不像我这样潇洒
[01:42.35]我受够了追逐名利 出现在你的地盘 留下一堆血迹
[01:45.77]
[01:46.40]我让她来我们的帮里混
[01:49.92]我让他们别惹我们的帮派 该开始整场游戏了
[01:53.37]
[02:08.18]我像鸟一样自由 这就是我这辈子想要的
[02:10.91]但是却压力不断
[02:12.37]直到我意识到 船到桥头自然直
[02:14.89]同时 我也在努力
[02:16.12]我想着那些太过年轻时 陷入困境的日子
[02:18.67]天天派对鬼混
[02:20.03]在这个灯火通明的城市里
[02:22.49]想烧个干净
[02:23.74]逃出他的安排 我没时间了 不用你们的意见
[02:26.29]除了我的妈妈
[02:27.32]为我的女儿奋斗 我只需要她
[02:29.23]我去努力时 她还有一个骄傲的爸爸
[02:31.12]我做到了
[02:32.97]我想我应该和我的兄弟一起
[02:34.81]我刚刚热身 开始表演吧
[02:36.63]我在训练这些伙伴 就跟在监狱里被迫学的那些一样
[02:39.64]A$AP和Cud 永存
[02:41.24]我在和这些蠢女孩调情
[02:43.44]学习其中奥秘
[02:44.44]让所有体验这种魔法般的感受
[02:46.36]没有父母的孩子
[02:48.19]写下字句 每个人都有一首属于自己的歌
[02:50.06]抓紧 坚持 不会错
[02:52.04]肚子歌唱
[02:54.77]我把A$AP纹在身上
[02:56.76]我把纽约纳入蓝图
[02:58.65]我用帮派武装
[03:00.53]他们会记住我的大名
[03:02.41]他们为了金链子抢劫男孩
[03:04.30]我得到了很多Goyard
[03:06.20]我的钱都是以袋计算的
[03:08.16]我从后面进入你的女人
[03:09.53]
[03:10.17]这些男孩不像我这样潇洒
[03:13.77]我受够了追逐名利 出现在你的地盘 留下一堆血迹
[03:17.15]
[03:17.79]我让她来我们的帮里混
[03:21.38]我让他们别惹我们的帮派 该开始整场游戏了
[03:24.97]游戏 游戏 
[03:26.64]
[03:27.56]帮派
[03:29.78]
[03:30.59]他们想在我前面 他们会记住我的大名
[03:34.95]
[04:09.44]事实就是真理
[04:12.35]
[04:13.06]但从未真正说谎
[04:18.06]
[04:19.78]事实就是真理
[04:22.48]
[04:23.21]但从未真正说谎
[04:28.16]
[04:29.91]事实就是真理
[04:33.29]但从未真正说谎
[04:37.96]
[04:39.83]事实就是真理
[04:43.38]但从未真正说谎
[04:48.51]
[04:50.12]事实就是真理
[04:53.70]但从未真正说谎
[04:56.63]
[04:58.55]这就是真理
[05:01.95]
[05:03.40]这就是真理
[05:06.75]从未
[05:08.00]
[05:09.33]从未
[05:11.03]我从未想要说谎
